non_fiction.name: The Art of Living
non_fiction.description: A profound exploration of the philosophies and practices that can help one lead a fulfilled and meaningful life.

non_fiction.name: Becoming
non_fiction.description: Michelle Obama's memoir chronicling her life from childhood through to her time as First Lady of the United States.

non_fiction.name: Educated
non_fiction.description: Tara Westover's memoir about growing up in a strict, survivalist family and her journey toward education and self-discovery.

non_fiction.name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
non_fiction.description: Yuval Noah Harari's exploration of the history of humankind, from the Stone Age to the modern age, examining how biology and history have shaped our societies.

non_fiction.name: The Power of Habit
non_fiction.description: Charles Duhigg explores how habits are formed and how they can be changed to improve personal and professional life.

non_fiction.name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
non_fiction.description: Daniel Kahneman examines the two systems of thinking that drive our judgments and decisions: the fast, intuitive system and the slower, more deliberate system.

non_fiction.name: Educating the Whole Child
non_fiction.description: An exploration of progressive education and its emphasis on the emotional, social, and cognitive development of children.

non_fiction.name: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
non_fiction.description: Rebecca Skloot tells the story of Henrietta Lacks and the immortal cells that were taken from her without her knowledge or consent, revolutionizing medical research.

non_fiction.name: Into the Wild
non_fiction.description: Jon Krakauer's true story of Christopher McCandless, who abandoned his life and sought adventure in the Alaskan wilderness, ultimately paying the ultimate price.

non_fiction.name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
non_fiction.description: Mark Manson challenges conventional wisdom with a counterintuitive approach to living a better life by caring less about the unimportant.

non_fiction.name: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking
non_fiction.description: Susan Cain explores the power of introverts in a society that tends to favor extroverted qualities, highlighting their strengths and contributions.

non_fiction.name: Outliers: The Story of Success
non_fiction.description: Malcolm Gladwell delves into the factors that contribute to high levels of success, from opportunities to cultural background and practice.

non_fiction.name: The 5 AM Club
non_fiction.description: Robin Sharma presents a philosophy for success based on waking up early and using the first hours of the day to set a productive and mindful tone.

non_fiction.name: The Glass Castle
non_fiction.description: Jeanette Walls' memoir about her unconventional and often turbulent childhood growing up in a family with parents who were both brilliant and dysfunctional.

non_fiction.name: The Wright Brothers
non_fiction.description: David McCullough's biography of the Wright brothers, the pioneers of flight, and their journey toward building the first successful airplane.

non_fiction.name: A Brief History of Time
non_fiction.description: Stephen Hawking's groundbreaking work that explores complex concepts about time, space, black holes, and the nature of the universe.

non_fiction.name: Why We Sleep
non_fiction.description: Matthew Walker examines the science of sleep and its critical importance to health, productivity, and overall well-being.

non_fiction.name: The Four Agreements
non_fiction.description: Don Miguel Ruiz reveals four key principles for creating a life of freedom, happiness, and love by transforming our beliefs.

non_fiction.name: Dare to Lead
non_fiction.description: Brené Brown encourages leaders to embrace vulnerability and courage in order to create stronger, more resilient teams and organizations.

non_fiction.name: Atomic Habits
non_fiction.description: James Clear explores the power of small habits and incremental change to create lasting improvements in one's personal and professional life.
